description: Russian immigre Michel Lucas has just arrived in town, bent on discovering all the wonders this new world can offer. This is the kind of welcome the Cossack gladly surrenders to where both parties can freely suck and fuck to their heartsâ€™ content, until reaching a mutual and satisfying detente.
title: Red Alert, Scene #01
